QuestData.Title: Getting the Points
QuestData.Description: The Thunderlord Spear is extremely light and strong.$b$bScout Ruk'gan might be able to use this and a few more like it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 Thunderlord Spears within the Bones of Agurak.
QuestData.RewardText: Hrm, yes these spears look pretty good.$b$bNot bad! I know just what to use these for!
